stations.title: Town Gates — The Word Lock
stations.story: The gate is sealed. An iron sign reads: “I am taken from a mine, locked up in a wooden case, never released unless I am struck.” What am I?
stations.hint: Found in a mine. Also inside pencils.

stations.title: Tavern of Whispers — The Harvest Name
stations.story: A tattered tavern menu flickers by lantern light. Only letters remain: S  A  _  O  N. The barkeep rasps, “It’s the month of harvest… the night Willow chose.”

stations.title: Cavern of Spells — The Anagram
stations.story: Scrawled in red: EVIL NOW DWELLS. Rearrange the letters to reveal what Willow bound this cavern with.
stations.hint: Two words. Possessive without the apostrophe.

stations.title: Cabin of the Head — The Riddle
stations.story: The Mayor’s severed head speaks: “I am always hungry, I must always be fed. The finger I touch will soon turn red.” What am I?

stations.title: The Final Spell — Break the Curse
stations.story: Gather the clue-words from prior stops. Speak the full chant to end the curse.
accept: by ash and bone, we end her throne.
